website_summaries.verdict: With the second version of the Nike Zoom Pegasus Turbo, users have found more positive points than negative ones. A number of factors that pertain to the shoe’s performance have been noticed and appreciated by runners. In addition, the construction and fit of the Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 have also impressed. Minor disappointments about a few structural elements and pricing make up the negative reviews of the shoe. Despite the criticisms, the Nike Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 is considered by the majority as a big improvement from its predecessor and, thus, a worthy purchase.
pros: Many reviewers agree that the Nike Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 is lightweight
in fact, even lighter than the previous version
Others specify that it feels less bulky than the first Zoom Pegasus Turbo
Some commenters have observed a firmer and, therefore, more stable ride with the shoe
The Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 enables snappy toe-offs, according to runners
Several runners praise the comfortability of the shoe
One user, in particular, stated that there were no hot spots in the foot
The fit of the shoe is commended by several wearers
Some say its sizing is accurate, while others mention a comfortable fit especially at the midfoot
The mesh of the Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 is “highly breathable,” and might be “Nike’s best in years,” according to a reviewer
A number of buyers are pleased with how the shoe looks and feels high-quality
The midsole provides a responsive step, wrote a satisfied customer
The Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 promotes a consistent running form, a reviewer reported
Runners concur that the shoe is ideal for race days and uptempo workouts because of its structure
cons: A couple of users are unhappy with the construction of the upper, particularly the tongue
Some feel it was too thin, while others think it feels odd against the skin
One commenter wrote that there is no padding in the heel area, which made for a bothersome ride
Although breathable, the mesh upper of the Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 is rigid, according to a wearer
Several customers agree that the shoe is expensive

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buying
customer_reviews.text: I’ve on had these shoes for a little less than 2 weeks and there amazing but the heel on the right shoe is starting to come off .
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Used dirty shoes
customer_reviews.text: Paid 170 usd for a pair of used and dirty shoes. Completely dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Heel on shoe easily separates
customer_reviews.text: Orders these on February 24th and I’m extremely disappointed. I did workouts only in them (1-2 runs per week) and the heel completely separated from the shoe. I’m in the process of trying to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes sir
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! So comfortable. They feel so great. As soon as I put them on I was bouncing around the living room. They are as precious to me as the one ring was to Gollum.
customer_reviews.author: Hands Down

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and light, but bottom ripped off.
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this shoe is incredible. However I will say the back “spur” on one of the shoes is starting to crack after only two runs, and it completely ripped off as I was taking off the other shoe. I don’t know if I just got a bad pair or if this is a common issue but as far as fit meant and comfort they feel incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Butler

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and Runs about one size bigger than labeled.
customer_reviews.text: That weird looking heel tore when I was removing the shoes. The front or ball area of the shoe is just wide and floppy feeling. When I run in them, it feels like my feet are just flapping the ground. Just alot of unresponsiveness. Oh, and I could not get the shoe tight enough on my foot. My heel would move against the back of the shoe and if I tightened it up enough to stop that, the laces would leave painful marks on top of my foot. Definitely not the minimalistic, tight fitting, supportive shoe I thought I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Daughtry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are truly the best... If you are looking to take running seriously and don't mind spending the money for it I highly recommend. They fit very comfortably and from someone who experiences joint pain from running I have had none of that. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great color and arch support for my grandson x country season
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: Is Counterfeit , Bad quality, the heel on the left shoe broke after second use. shoes don’t have the size , model etc printed on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Amazon gave me the wrong color, but its a good shoe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a purple color but was given a grey one. However, I still tried it on and ran a good 10 miles with it. I never felt zoom x foam until now and realized how good it felt running faster at long distances. This shoe does not need breaking in and it feels good the moment you put it on. Its definitely not a shoe to race a mile in but very good fast long-distance workouts and also for races like the 10k - half marathon. I'm going to keep this grey one even though I'm bummed out its not purple. But the purple one looked the best.
customer_reviews.author: Monkthatruns

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These were used! Dirty on the bottom, not in an original box and weird odor in the box. Would not advise anyone to make a purchase from this seller, check out many other negative reviews too (wish we would have before making this purchase.) These will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: Unlace the shoe to take off...!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking show but within a short period of time I started getting a blister on my left heel. This is the first pair of Nike running shoes where this has happened. Then I tried to take my shoe off without unlacing them and used my right foot to slip off the left shoe and the sole separated from the upper. I have doing with all previous ‘Zoom’ versions. Have to go back to a different version. Can’t recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Coastal Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for dedicated & fast runners
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoe! Not for every runner though. It you are a runner who likes to run fast and looking for a racing shoe you should totally snag these shoes. If you are a runner for fitness and cardio you may want to check out a different Nike shoe.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL GARIEPY

customer_reviews.title: First Nike that makes my knees hurt
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid walker. However for the first time a pair of Nike’s are causing my knees to ache when I wear them. Going back to my old ones. Wish I could return.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Sai

customer_reviews.title: Is shoes were used and stunk
customer_reviews.text: Is shoes were sold at top dollar and they are obviously previously used and smell how dare you
customer_reviews.author: Joshua holloway

customer_reviews.title: Best athletic shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Zoom Pegasus'. They are the best athletic shoes I have ever owned due to the superior comfort & fit. They also look great.
customer_reviews.author: EMC24

customer_reviews.title: It's like running on the most super comfortable poorly designed shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable, but poorly made. after 2 weeks from purchase the backend of one of the soles broke somehow (i land on midfoot and not the heel) luckily i could still return it for a full refund. switched to Zoom Fly 3 which is superb
customer_reviews.author: O.

customer_reviews.title: Defective sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I wore the sneakers twice, and the sole is already damaged. You can see the cut in the heel of the sneaker, and from virtually no use it is quite disappointing. It appears these sneakers were defective. I am trying to get in touch with the company, however there is no contact information. If anyone can reach out to me, I would greatly appreciate it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Macchia

customer_reviews.title: Not Authorized Retailer!
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit product! Do NOT purchase from them. Shoes broke after 3 wears and I was told by Nike they would not honor my warranty because JM sneakers is not an authorized retailer. I went ahead and did an alternate send back to Nike for inspection and they wrote me back and said the shoes have been altered and are not authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: This shoe came to me on March 5th I didn’t start using it until probably March 10th, went on a few runs and half of the sole is coming off and it’s April 4th.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality for Nike
customer_reviews.text: Have only had these shoes 3.5 months and they’re the worst quality pair of Nike running shoes I’ve owned. The soles are already splitting apart. I run less than 10 miles/week on average so the damage isn’t from normal wear and tear. I’d look for another style of Nike running shoe or another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Matt W.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality and design. Light shoe loved how they felt
customer_reviews.text: They cracked in the back the first time I wore them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color Cool Nike
customer_reviews.text: What’s to say love the color they are Nike fit great
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great Show
customer_reviews.text: Great walking show, so much so I bought a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality product
customer_reviews.text: The sole is loosing after 2 months of normal use, like only wore for running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ZERO PAIN
customer_reviews.text: Ran 3 miles the day after I received these shoes and they were great. Experienced zero pain in my feet/ankles as usual. However, the shoes were half a size too small so I did experience pain in my heel. If you get the right size, these are amazing! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Lightest Running Shoe EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fit and feel of these shoes. They were a great replacement to my Zoom Pegasus 35s.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Burroughs

customer_reviews.title: Bottom heel of the Shoe ripped off
customer_reviews.text: The bottom heel of the shoe ripped off easy as I was removing my shoe after using it a couple of months. I wonder if there is warranty on these things. I don't recommend these running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: hailu keremo

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes lasted me 1.5 months before the sole on one of them completely ripped off. For $195, you would think Nike would make a high-quality product. I’m still waiting for my refund too.
customer_reviews.author: Lora Bojilova

customer_reviews.title: Good runn
customer_reviews.text: My second pair in 4 month, they are light; They also have good grip on the paved roads. Will buy my third pair very soon.
customer_reviews.author: James  R

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The Nike Zoom Pegasus Turbo shoes are the best damn running shoes I’ve ever put on my feet. I’m an avid runner of marathons to 5K’s , excellent for both.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Factory defect product
customer_reviews.text: The shoes arrived on time but had a scratch near the soles (A factory defect ) .. paying 240 usd for shoes, a scratch is not something that you are expecting
customer_reviews.author: Analeidy López

customer_reviews.title: Broke Within a Month.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great and comfortable shoe but the back of mine began to tear within a month of owning it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lenhart

customer_reviews.title: Poor quailty
customer_reviews.text: After just a few runs, the back of the shoe completely fell apart...completely unacceptable for a running shoe with this price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Ragakid

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying running with my new Nike Pegasus Turbo 2 One of the best running shoes I ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: Saar

customer_reviews.title: Really BAD quality
customer_reviews.text: I guess the picture says everything... I am very disappointed since they were not cheap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Leal-Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Light weight high vis
customer_reviews.text: Took a little getting used to But I love these shoes great for running and walking
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes messing up
customer_reviews.text: They keep tearing up. This is the second pair I've bought for my brother. They break within a week
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t worn these shoes much at all and the heel is coming off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Schmeits

customer_reviews.title: Fake Nikes
customer_reviews.text: Fakeys! Don’t be fooled people! The Nike swoosh is painted on with a marker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to wear
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast n the shoe is very comfort to wear.
customer_reviews.author: humphrey tan chian

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Feel lightweight with the Nike Men’s Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 running shoe. Responsiveness and cushion will make your long distance runs feel phenomenal mile after mile
feature_bullets: The Nike Zoom Pegasus Turbo 2 Is Updated With A Featherlight Upper, While Innovative Foam Brings Revolutionary Responsiveness To Your Long Distance Training
The Lofted Mesh And Synthetic Upper Is Lighter And The Translucent Material Makes It Look As Breathable As It Feels
The Rubber Outsole Helps Absorb Impact And Provide Multi-Surface Traction
An Ultralight Nike Zoomx Midsole Delivers Nike Running'S Greatest Energy Return Yet
The Engineered Heel Collar Tapers Away From Foot For Comfort Around Your Achilles Tendon"
